entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
